overview: In addition to his role as chief financial officer, Valter contributes to agency-wide strategic planning and is responsible for leading IT and HR operations. Prior to joining SolutionSet, Valter was senior vice president and chief financial officer at Omnicom-owned DDB Chicago, one of the largest advertising agencies in Chicago, where he managed all costs during record years in terms of margins and guided an executive team in budgeting, forecasting, and profitability analysis. He served as chief financial officer for three other companies in the DDB Chicago Group: Tribal, Matrix and Downtown Partners. Before that, he was financial director and chief financial officer at DDB Brazil, and held senior financial positions in Brazil at Pillsbury/General Mills, Citibank, and Coopers & Lybrand.
